original_title: Fear and Loathing and Party in Las Ponta Delgada
overview: A small group of people is in a music festival on an island in the middle of the Atlantic Ocean. In "Fear and Loathing and Party in Las Ponta Delgada", we experience the happiness and insanity behind one of the most unique festivals in the world.
title: Fear and Loathing and Party in Las Ponta Delgada
